description:
# Explore an Exciting Opportunity to Live and Work in Madrid

## Overview

Are you ready to broaden your horizons and immerse yourself in a vibrant new culture while teaching English? Our Madrid Lifestyle & TEFL Programs offer an unique approach to living and working in Spain, designed for individuals from a variety of backgrounds.

## Who Should Consider This Program?

  • **Recent College Graduates**: Take a break before pursuing further education or starting your professional career.
  • **Career Changers**: If you're ready to transition out of the corporate world into a fulfilling new role.
  • **Current English Teachers**: Whether you have a TEFL or CELTA certificate, there's a place for you.
  • **Recent High School Graduates**: If you're 18 and eager to start your journey as an ESL teacher.
  • **Retirees**: Embrace a new adventure in your semi-retirement.
  • **Independent Professionals**: If you're economically self-sufficient and excited about living abroad.
  • **Remote Workers**: Those with a flexible job can balance work with the thrill of life in Madrid.

## What to Expect

  • **Cultural Experience**: Enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle, discover a romance language, and meet new people.
  • **Vibrant City Life**: Madrid is known for its low cost of living, exceptional transportation, rich history, cultural diversity, and renowned nightlife.
  • **Supportive Community**: From social events to familiar faces, you'll find camaraderie among fellow expats.

## Program Details

  • Duration**: One Year
  • Visa**: Enjoy the security of a One-Year Student Visa, allowing you to work up to 30 hours a week, with an impressive pay rate.
  • Curriculum**:
  • 20 hours per week of Spanish language study through an Instituto Cervantes accredited program.
  • A 120-hour, four-week TEFL course accredited by College of Teachers.
  • Job Placement**:
  • After completing the TEFL program, you'll start teaching English while receiving support in finding additional job opportunities in partner English schools throughout Madrid.
  • Access potential summer teaching positions for added income.

## Program Costs

  • **One Year Study Abroad with TEFL & Spanish**: 2,780€
  • **Madrid Lifestyle Program with Spanish for TEFL Holders**: 1,970€

### Included in the Programs:

  • One-Year Student Visa for legal living and working in Spain.
  • Ten-month, 20-hour per week Spanish program.
  • Guaranteed employment with our English academy and additional opportunities with partner schools.
  • Activities through the Garcia Lorca Spanish School Adventure Club, enhancing your cultural engagement and social life.
  • Exceptional value with future tuition-free years.

## Join the Community

Take the next step towards making your dream of living and working in Spain a reality. Engage with a vibrant community, enhance your professional skills, and embrace a lifestyle that balances work and adventure.

Explore the possibilities today!

Employment Type: Full-Time
